head: Fire safety solutions
subhead: solutions for the management of evacuation of people
pain: One of the most important security systems of the building, which is responsible for the timely notification of the Ministry of Emergency Services about fires in the premises, as well as notifies people about the fire and shows the evacuation routes. In addition, to ensure the maximum safety of people, the system takes over the management of other systems of the building at the time of fire
solutions: Management systems for the evacuation of people during a fire
details: Our team of specialists works with all the equipment of fire alarm systems certified in Ukraine and provides:

- organization of voice notification systems in accordance with the regulatory requirements of CO-3, CO-4 by automatic activation of notification messages during a fire and manual duplication of activation of notifications by the operator

During a fire, due to poor visibility due to smoke, there is a need for additional illumination of the evacuation routes. This system is automatically activated when a fire is detected. Competencies of our specialists in this area:
texts1: - visit of the engineer for examination
- installation, work with equipment of domestic and foreign manufacturers
texts3: - development of evacuation plans as part of project documentation
